title: Executive Order 5532-Modification of Reservoir-Site Reserve No. 1, Wenatchee Lake Reservoir, Washington
content: The Executive order of January 17, 1911, creating Reservoir-Site Reserve No. 1, is hereby modified to the extent of authorizing the Federal Power Commission to issue a license for Project No. 1129, on the following described lands:
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5532-Modification of Reservoir-Site Reserve No. 1, Wenatchee Lake Reservoir, Washington Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361171
